Is the new Verus testnet only accessible through the command line?

No, the new Verus testnet is accessible through both the graphical user interface (GUI) for basic operations and the command line for more advanced functions. This allows users to choose their preferred method of interaction.

**The result will be true if the signature is valid.**
```
true
```
